scripts.build: yarn build-deps && yarn workspace app build
scripts.start: yarn build-deps && yarn workspace app tauri dev
scripts.watch: concurrently "yarn workspace @apicize/lib-typescript watch" "yarn workspace @apicize/toolkit watch" "yarn workspace app tauri dev"
scripts.build-deps: yarn workspace @apicize/lib-typescript build && yarn workspace @apicize/toolkit build
scripts.build:release: yarn run build-deps && yarn tauri build
